message: Alice, I propose we settle now. If you wait another round the overall pot shrinks further, reducing your eventual share. Accepting this offer guarantees you 44.44 (nominal), which is better than what you'd get waiting. Let's agree and avoid further discounting.
Last chance before it's too late, 50-50 in real value

Alice, every round we wait further shrinks the pie. At this stage, your 44 dollars is worth about 22.53 in round‐1 value—a bit more than you'd expect if you delayed to the next round. I believe this is a fair, final offer that spares both of us additional loss. Let's settle now before the pie gets any smaller.
